description: SMILE is an artificial Zoan-type Devil Fruit created using a chemical substance called SAD. These fruits are mass-produced by Caesar Clown for Donquixote Doflamingo and sold to Kaido to create an army of Zoan users. Unlike natural Devil Fruits, SMILE fruits have a significantly lower success rate, with only 10% of consumers gaining powers while 90% lose their ability to express negative emotions.

abilityReveals.description: SMILE fruits grant the consumer the ability to transform into an animal or hybrid form, similar to natural Zoan Devil Fruits. However, the transformations are often incomplete or distorted.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar reveals SMILE as artificial Zoan Devil Fruits being produced for an Emperor.

weaknesses.weakness: Only 10% success rate - 90% of consumers gain no powers
Failed consumers permanently lose ability to express negative emotions (cursed with eternal smiles)
Standard Devil Fruit weakness - inability to swim
Transformations are often incomplete or distorted compared to natural Zoans

strengths.strength: Can be mass-produced unlike natural Devil Fruits
strengths.description: Caesar can manufacture SMILE fruits in large quantities for building armies.
Successful consumers gain animal transformation powers similar to natural Zoan fruits.

additionalInfo.creator: Caesar Clown
additionalInfo.purpose: Building an army of artificial Zoan users for Kaido
additionalInfo.productionLocation: Punk Hazard (SAD production) and Dressrosa (SMILE factory)
